definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: You need someone within the organization who is well respected andaware of the political goings-on.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一個在集團裏備受尊重並且瞭解政治動態的人。

sentences.english: The relationship of apolipoprotein gene and polymorphisms to dyslipidemia got people's highly attention.
sentences.chinese: 載脂蛋白基因多態性與血脂異常的關係備受人們關注。

sentences.english: Previously, the pastries and cakes she had baked for family and friends had been popular.
sentences.chinese: 她過去爲家人和朋友烤制的糕點備受歡迎。

sentences.english: Table tennis is our national sport which gets most of the attention of the nation. It's very popular.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓球是我們的國球，在全國備受矚目，相當流行。

sentences.english: Polar vascular plants have attracted attentions due to the special environment where they grow.
sentences.chinese: 極地維管植物因其所處環境的特殊性而備受關注。

sentences.english: Favouritism is certainly a controversial topic.
sentences.chinese: 偏心確實是一個備受爭議的話題。

sentences.english: The role of the mother tongue in FLL has caught much attention of researchers.
sentences.chinese: 母語在外語學習中的作用一直備受關注。

sentences.english: Of these, Poland was praised for making rapid progress through school reform.
sentences.chinese: 其中，波蘭因學校改革而進步神速，備受誇讚。

sentences.english: Cheaper drug prices have always been a concern.
sentences.chinese: 降低藥價已經成爲一件備受關注的事情。

sentences.english: As oil spills occur frequently throughout the world, marine oil pollution has received increasing attention recently.
sentences.chinese: 隨着溢油事故的頻繁發生，海洋溢油污染備受關注。

sentences.english: Her latest novel was received with great eclat.
sentences.chinese: 她最新的小說備受讚賞。

sentences.english: The East Stand, for all its magnificence also has a controversial past.
sentences.chinese: 富麗堂皇的東看臺也有着備受爭議的歷史。

sentences.english: It's this side of her that endears Condoleezza to her friends.
sentences.chinese: 正是她的這一面，使康多莉扎備受朋友的喜愛。

sentences.english: Ranking Ethnics has beer always adored in conventional society.
sentences.chinese: 倫常綱紀一直備受傳統社會推重。

sentences.english: His name was on the gridiron at Westminster.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字在英國議會備受譴責。

sentences.english: The quality of the Dongjiang water has long been critised.
sentences.chinese: 東江水水質一直備受批評。
